lustre/tests/openfile.c

00035 #if 0
00036 #define DEBUG
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 /* for O_DIRECTORY and O_DIRECT */
00040 #ifndef _GNU_SOURCE
00041 #define _GNU_SOURCE
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #include <stdio.h>
00045 #include <sys/types.h>
00046 #include <sys/stat.h>
00047 #include <fcntl.h>
00048 #include <errno.h>
00049 #include <string.h>
00050 #include <stdlib.h>
00051 #include <unistd.h>
00052 #include <lustre/lustre_user.h>
00053 
00054 typedef struct flag_mapping {
00055        const char *string;
00056        const int  flag;
00057 } FLAG_MAPPING;
00058 
00059 FLAG_MAPPING flag_table[] = {
00060        {"O_RDONLY", O_RDONLY},
00061        {"O_WRONLY", O_WRONLY},
00062        {"O_RDWR", O_RDWR},
00063        {"O_CREAT", O_CREAT},
00064        {"O_EXCL", O_EXCL},
00065        {"O_NOCTTY", O_NOCTTY},
00066        {"O_TRUNC", O_TRUNC},
00067        {"O_APPEND", O_APPEND},
00068        {"O_NONBLOCK", O_NONBLOCK},
00069        {"O_NDELAY", O_NDELAY},
00070        {"O_SYNC", O_SYNC},
00071 #ifdef O_DIRECT
00072        {"O_DIRECT", O_DIRECT},
00073 #endif
00074        {"O_LARGEFILE", O_LARGEFILE},
00075        {"O_DIRECTORY", O_DIRECTORY},
00076        {"O_NOFOLLOW", O_NOFOLLOW},
00077        {"O_LOV_DELAY_CREATE", O_LOV_DELAY_CREATE},
00078        {"", -1}
00079 };
00080 
00081 void Usage_and_abort(void)
00082 {
00083        fprintf(stderr, "Usage: openfile -f flags [ -m mode ] filename \n");
00084        fprintf(stderr, "e.g. openfile -f O_RDWR:O_CREAT -m 0755 /etc/passwd\n");
00085        exit(-1);
00086 }
00087 
00088 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00089 {
00090         int    fd;
00091         int    flags = 0;
00092         mode_t mode = 0644;
00093         char  *fname = NULL;
00094         int    mode_set = 0;
00095         int    flag_set = 0;
00096         int    c;
00097         int    save_errno = 0;
00098         int    print_usage = 0;
00099         char  *cloned_flags = NULL;
00100 
00101         if (argc == 1)
00102                 Usage_and_abort();
00103 
00104         while ((c = getopt (argc, argv, "f:m:")) != -1) {
00105                 switch (c) {
00106                 case 'f': {
00107                         char *tmp;
00108 
00109                         cloned_flags = (char *)malloc(strlen(optarg)+1);
00110                         if (cloned_flags == NULL) {
00111                                 fprintf(stderr, "Insufficient memory.\n");
00112                                 save_errno = -1;
00113                                 goto out;
00114                         }
00115 
00116                         strncpy(cloned_flags, optarg, strlen(optarg)+1);
00117                         flags = atoi(cloned_flags);
00118                         if (flags > 0) {
00119                                 flag_set = 1;
00120 #ifdef DEBUG
00121                                 printf("flags = %d\n",flags);
00122 #endif
00123                                 break;
00124                         } else 
00125                                 flags = 0;
00126 
00127                         for (tmp = strtok(cloned_flags, ":|"); tmp;
00128                              tmp = strtok(NULL, ":|")) {
00129                                 int i = 0;
00130 #ifdef DEBUG
00131                                 printf("flags = %s\n",tmp);
00132 #endif
00133                                 flag_set = 1;
00134                                 for (i = 0; flag_table[i].flag != -1; i++) {
00135                                         if (!strcmp(tmp, flag_table[i].string)){
00136                                                 flags |= flag_table[i].flag;
00137                                                 break;
00138                                         }
00139                                 }
00140 
00141                                 if (flag_table[i].flag == -1) {
00142                                         fprintf(stderr, "No such flag: %s\n",
00143                                                 tmp);
00144                                         save_errno = -1;
00145                                         goto out;
00146                                 }
00147                         }
00148 #ifdef DEBUG
00149                         printf("flags = %x\n", flags);
00150 #endif
00151                         break;
00152                 }
00153                 case 'm':
00154 #ifdef DEBUG
00155                         printf("mode = %s\n", optarg);
00156 #endif
00157                         mode = strtol(optarg, NULL, 8);
00158                         mode_set = 1;
00159 #ifdef DEBUG
00160                         printf("mode = %o\n", mode);
00161 #endif
00162                         break;
00163                 default:
00164                         fprintf(stderr, "Bad parameters.\n");
00165                         print_usage = 1;
00166                         goto out;
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00170         if (optind == argc) {
00171                 fprintf(stderr, "Bad parameters.\n");
00172                 print_usage = 1;
00173                 goto out;
00174         }
00175 
00176         fname = argv[optind];
00177 
00178         if (!flag_set) {
00179                 fprintf(stderr, "Missing flag or file-name\n");
00180                 save_errno = -1;
00181                 goto out;
00182         }
00183 
00184 
00185         if (flags & O_CREAT)
00186                 fd = open(fname, flags, mode);
00187         else
00188                 fd = open(fname, flags);
00189 
00190         save_errno = errno;
00191 
00192         if (fd != -1) {
00193                 printf("Succeed in opening file \"%s\"(flags=%s",
00194                        fname, cloned_flags);
00195 
00196                 if (mode_set)
00197                         printf(", mode=%o", mode);
00198                 printf(")\n");
00199                 close(fd);
00200         } else {
00201                 fprintf(stderr, "Error in opening file \"%s\"(flags=%s",
00202                         fname, cloned_flags);
00203                 if (mode_set)
00204                         fprintf(stderr, ", mode=%o", mode);
00205                 fprintf(stderr, ") %d: %s\n", save_errno, strerror(save_errno));
00206         }
00207 
00208 out:
00209         if (cloned_flags)
00210                 free(cloned_flags);
00211         if (print_usage)
00212                 Usage_and_abort();
00213 
00214         return save_errno;
00215 }
